Literature.Title: Antibacterial activities of amphiphilic cyclic cell-penetrating peptides against multidrug-resistant pathogens.
Literature.Author: Oh D, Sun J, Nasrolahi Shirazi A, LaPlante KL, Rowley DC, Parang K

Literature.Title: Design, Synthesis, and Evaluation of Amphiphilic Cyclic and Linear Peptides Composed of Hydrophobic and Positively-Charged Amino Acids as Antibacterial Agents

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>158µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>158µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus LAC(MIC=>128µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>128µg/ml)
